description: CRM for managing customer records and sales pipeline.

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_search_customers
tools.description: Searches for customers based on the given parameters with pagination support.

assigned_to_email.description: Email address of the person assigned to the customer

last_contact_date_min.description: Minimum last contact date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

last_contact_date_max.description: Maximum last contact date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

follow_up_by_min.description: Minimum follow up date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

follow_up_by_max.description: Maximum follow up date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

page.description: Page number of results to return

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_update_customer
tools.description: Updates a customer record by ID.

field.description: Field to update. Available fields are: 'customer_name', 'assigned_to_email', 'customer_email', 'customer_phone', 'last_contact_date', 'product_interest', 'status', 'notes', 'follow_up_by'

assigned_to_email.description: Email address of the person assigned to the customer

status.description: Current status of the customer. One of: 'Qualified', 'Won', 'Lost', 'Lead', 'Proposal'

last_contact_date.description: The last date the customer was contacted. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

product_interest.description: Product interest of the customer. One of: 'Software', 'Hardware', 'Services', 'Consulting', 'Training'

follow_up_by.description: Date for the next follow up. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_delete_customer
tools.description: Deletes a customer record by ID.
